best-seller.translation[0].definitions[0: a popular product, especially a book, that many people buy
His new book went straight to number one on the best-seller list.
The game is already a bestseller in Japan.
best-seller.translation[1].definitions[0: a very popular book or other product, that many people buy
The book has been on the New York Times fiction best-seller list for more than 30 weeks.
